title: 820-3437 RAM Beeping
message:
[LEFT][COLOR=#555555][FONT=inherit]820-3437 clean board RAM beep sound at startup, I already gave the 4 RAM chips a reflow but same issue.

I don't thinks this boards are known for RAM issues, any guidance will be greatly appreciated.[/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]

title: 820-3437 RAM Beeping
message:
PP1V2_S3 is present at RAM Caps
PP0V6_S0_DDRVTT present

title: 820-3437 RAM Beeping
message:
You are not the first with same in issue in this board.
Could be bad RAM chip, which cannot be solved by reflow.
Can also be broken trace/solder under CPU, or a RAM chip.
You can try reball, or change RAM chips.
This will not help if problem is on CPU side...

title: 820-3437 RAM Beeping
message: Thanks, there are 4 chips and also there is U4000, should I also replace U4000?

title: 820-3437 RAM Beeping
message: U4000 is dedicated for camera, not involved here...

title: 820-3437 RAM Beeping
message:
Put new RAM chips and same problem, this board is RIP
Thanks for help!
